thread.title: Drake offers fans a refund after Travis Scott falls through hole on stage and breaks rapper's globe prop
thread.title_full: Drake offers fans a refund after Travis Scott falls through hole on stage and breaks rapper's globe prop

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Drake offers fans a refund after Travis Scott falls through hole on stage and breaks rapper's globe prop
text:
Celebs Drake offers fans a refund after Travis Scott falls through hole on stage and breaks rapper's globe prop It's unclear if the rapper was just joking but some concert-goers appear to be taking him for his word... Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Drake offers his gig for FREE after London technical problems Share this video Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing! Could   
Drake apparently promised fans a refund during his show in London on Wednesday night after guest performer Travis Scott fell through a hole on stage. 
Travis' fall through the huge opening, meant the giant globe underneath - which has come out at previous concerts - was presumably no longer in working order. 
“I’m doing this s**t for free tonight. I don’t give a f**k,” Drake told the audience following the mishap. 
“Because, you know what? It’s real love in here tonight […] I don’t give a f**k about none of these people f**king up. I’m giving all their s**t back.” 
"Still lauging at Travis Scott falling through that hole tbh cheers pal I just saw drake for free!" one confident concert-goer tweeted following the show. Drake offers everyone at London show a refund after Travis Scott falls and breaks a prop (Photo: Instagram) Drake offers everyone at London show a refund after Travis Scott falls and breaks a prop (Photo: Instagram) 
"Travis Scott falling was the best thing ever, free drake concert," wrote a second. 
Whether he does actually give everyone a refund remains to be seen. 
And fortunately, Scott wasn't hurt. 
After the show he tweeted his fans: "This s**t was fun London is wild. By far one of the most turnt and epic s**t ever f**k." Like us on Facebook
